Name: Café Gates
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
22.5 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
Instructions: Place bar spoon in glass, POUR first three ingredients and top up with coffee, then float cream by pouring over the back of a spoon.
Review: Chocolate orange with coffee and cream.
Nutrition: One serving of Café Gates contains 235 calories
